College_Summary: Shrinathji Institute of Biotechnology & Management - [SIBM], Rajsamand, Rajasthan, The Shrinathji Institute of Management is one of the pioneering institutes in management science and studies in the princely state of Rajasthan. It has a lot to offer to its management students who enroll themselves in this college for a professional outlook. The portfolio which the Institute has to offer signifies an intensified and strategic approach towards business studies. The BBA and MBA courses that are taught, respectively of 3 and 2 years are the most famous of the lot in the state of Rajasthan, right after the Indian Institute of Management in the city of Udaipur. Ignition of young brains, teaching them perseverance and helping them to achieve their goals and ambitions through dedicated work is the mission of this college. It aims to provide the best in class quality education and practical training to its students.

College_Name: Shree Kallaji Vedic University
College_Summary: Shree Kallaji Vedic University is also known as SKVU situated in Chittorgarh, in the state of Rajasthan, India. It is a private university and is established in the year of 2018. This institute is approved by University Grands Commission (UGC). This institute is also called Gurukul based on traditional education systems like the vedas, culture and valuable literature. Since the main purpose is to establish this university for meditation, publicity, conservation of rare manuscripts etc. This institute offers under graduate, post graduate and diploma programs with highly educated faculty members. The application form is available in the official website. The selection is based on the merit based.   All the facilities are provided by the university for the students which are fully satisfied for them.

The process of college admission is strictly based on merit and 27%, 15%, and 8 seats are reserved for OBC, SC and ST categories. The mode of application is offline.

The admissions criteria are purely merit-based, and eligibility is marks scored in the qualifying exam (10+2). The application process is online.

Other popular courses include a Diploma program across 3 specializations and a PG Diploma course in Design and CAD. College_Name: NIA Jaipur
College_Summary: National Institute of Ayurveda, Jaipur (NIA Jaipur) is the apex autonomous institute for Ayurveda Education established in 1976 under the aegis of the Ministry of AYUSH, Government of India. NIA Jaipur is the first Central Government Institute to be declared as Deemed to be University in the field of Ayush. The institute is affiliated to the Rajasthan Ayurved University, Jodhpur. NIA has been accredited with Grade “A” by NAAC.

College_Summary: Chaudhary Charan Singh National Institute of Agricultural Marketing (CSSNIAM), popularly known as NIAM Jaipur, is a premier national-level institute. The college offers PG Diploma equivalent to MBA in Agri-Business Management (ABM). Candidates with 50% aggregate marks in Graduation with a valid CAT score are eligible to apply for admission. Applicants, for admission, are shortlisted on the basis of CAT/ CMAT score, Essay writing, GD, PI, and Work Experience. The interested students must apply online on the official website for the admission process.

Courses_Details.Course Name: Post Graduate Diploma in Agri-Business Management [PGDM-ABM]

College_Name: College of Dairy and Food Science Technology - [CDFST], Udaipur
Mahatma Gandhi Veterinary College, Bharatpur
College_Summary: Mahatma Gandhi Veterinary College, Bharatpur aims to produce professional and competent young veterinarians for catering to the needs of animal husbandry management and practices, scientific breeding and cure and prevention from diseases in a timely and highly relevant way. These professionals need to motivate the elderly people and the women to adopt and use scientific practices of backyard/ small scale livestock and poultry, for upliftment of this region’s rural economy. MGVC’s vision is to offer students a great background for quality education resulting in rewarding career opportunities. With a mission to bring worldwide practices through widespread use of latest technologies, MGVC offers students with the best campus and faculty members.

College_Name: Arch College of Design and Business, Jaipur
College_Summary: Established in 2000, Arch College of Design and Business, Jaipur is affiliated to University of Rajasthan, Jaipur. Over the span of 24 illustrious years, ARCH College has been pivotal in the nurturing of over 7000 alumni, shaping them into accomplished and innovative professionals and entrepreneurs. The institute has partnership with Pearson and is accredited to deliver Six BTEC Level 5 HND qualifications in Art & Design. It offers UG and PG courses in the field of Business and Design. The institute’s flagship courses include B.Des across 4 specializations and an M.Voc course in 5 specializations. Apart from that, the institute also offers BBA and B.A. in 5 specializations affiliated to University of Rajasthan and M.Des in Interior Design affiliated to Vishvakarma Skills University.

College_Name: Dezyne E'cole College, Ajmer
Indian Institute of Crafts and Design (IICD), Jaipur
College_Summary: Indian Institute of Crafts and Design (IICD), Jaipur is an autonomous institute established in the year 1997. It is affiliated to Rajasthan ILD Skills University. Presently, it is running Undergraduate, Integrated Post-graduate, Postgraduate programs in areas of crafts & design. Admissions are offered on the basis of an Entrance Exam conducted by the institute. Students of this institute get ample career opportunities in well-reputed organizations after completion of the course.

College_Name: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design - [INIFD], Ajmer
College_Summary: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design (INIFD), Ajmer was established in 1995 with the aims to take education in fashion and design to the common man in India by providing quality design education at affordable fee right at their doorstep. It is one of the esteemed institutes in the field of fashion designing, is located in Ajmer. The institute is the first educational institute in the world to completely digitize education to change the learning landscape for thousands of students across all INIFD centre. The institute offers excellent facilities and education to the students. Many famous people from the fashion world like Neeta Lulla, Ashley Rebello, Rahul Mishra and Anuj Sharma also visit the Institute from time to time.

College_Name: Inter National Institute of Fashion Design - [INIFD], Jaipur
College_Summary: International Institute of Fashion Design (INIFD), Jaipur is one of the centers of the world’s largest network of design institute's, Inter National Institute of Fashion Design. The institute was established in 1999 in Jaipur. It is the only Autodesk authorized center in Rajasthan. Till now, the institute has produced over five lakh designers. Some of the classes are conducted by internationally acclaimed designer, Mr. Hemant Trevedi. The institute is associated with the London School of Trends (LST), New York Fashion Week and London Fashion Week to provide its students the international exposure. Apart from this, the institute has a collaboration with Lakme Fashion Week, FBB, Fashion Scout, Femina Miss India, Indian Interior Design and more. Some of the leading mentors of the institute include Twinkle Khanna, Hemant Trivedi, Ashley Rebello, Sara Corker, Joseph Toronka, Manish Malhotra and more.

Admission to all the courses is granted based on the performance of the candidates on the entrance test. The institute boasts of high-class infrastructural facilities and provides quality education under a strong team of faculties.

College_Summary: Jaipur Dental College (JDC) was the first private college in Rajasthan and was established in the year 2000. It has been approved by the Dental Council of India (DCI). It was previously affiliated to Rajasthan University of Health Sciences but, it is now affiliated to Maharaj Vinayak Global University. The college offers undergraduate, postgraduate, and research programs in the field of dental sciences. Admission is based on merit for postgraduate and Ph.D. courses whereas it is based on entrance exam scores for the undergraduate course and is carried out online. It has also been awarded “The Best Dental College” award by Prime Time Research Media Pvt. Ltd.

College_Summary: Maharaja Ganga Singh Dental College and Research Centre was run and established in 2005 by Shri Kishan Chand Sarawagi, President of Sarwagi Dental trust. The institute was set up with a very clear vision and motive of providing quality dental education and modern medical facilities to the poor and needy. The Institute makes education regarding dental science reach to those sectors that hardly have any access to resources. The college currently provides Bachelors and Master’s degree in dental science to its students.

The advancement in Education and research are the two aims of the college. The College provides World Class Education as well as dental care all under one roof. College_Summary: NIMS School of Law College is a part of the NIMS UNiversity which is one of the biggest and most renowned self financed universities in the northern part of India. It is located in the outskirts of Jaipur close to the Aravali Ranges in Rajasthan. While the University was established in 2008, the School of Law was started during the 2010-11 session. Apart from UGC’s recognition, it possesses all the necessary accreditations and approvals from the apex regulatory councils of the country. It boasts of high quality infrastructure, technically advanced classrooms, lush green campus and modernized laboratory facilities. It is spread over a 60-acre campus which provides all kinds of facilities for the overall development of its students. The School of Law is approved by BCI (Bar Council of India) and has provisions for providing law courses to 120 students in each session.

College_Summary: Jain Vishva Bharati University is one of the leading and most admired Universities in India. In the year 1991, It achieved deemed university status under Section 3 of the UGC Act of 1956. NAAC has accredited this university with an ‘A’ grade. The university is running Under Graduate, Post Graduate, Ph.D. and Certificate Courses across various streams. It also offers education through distance learning mode.

College_Name: JRRSU
College_Summary:
Jodhpur National University (JNU), Rajasthan was established in 2008. The university is located in Jodhpur, Rajasthan. Jodhpur National University is approved by AICTE, UGC, DCI, and BCI. The university has an international collaboration with Nanzing Global Education Group- Singapore. The motto of the University is “Future is not a gift, it is an achievement”. It is a private university.
The University offers various undergraduate, postgraduate and doctoral programmes. Admissions at Jodhpur National University to these courses are conducted every year.
 The main objective of the University is to provide the state of the art education at the doorsteps of the prospective student community for which earlier they have to travel far distances and for this reason scores of bright students could not peruse higher and technical education. Jodhpur National University received an award for educational excellence in Indo-Global Education Expo & Summit 2014 organized by The Indus Foundation Inc. (USA) in association with the Government of Telangana.

College_Name: Jain Vishva Bharati University, Nagaur
College_Summary: Maharaja Ganga Singh University (MGSU) is a state university located in Bikaner, Rajasthan. It is recognised by the UGC and also a member of the Association of Indian Universities (AIU). MGSU has 449 affiliated colleges as well as 150 affiliated B.Ed colleges. At present, MGSU offers various UG, PG, Doctoral, and PG Diploma programs through 12 different departments and affiliated colleges. Check MGSU Affiliated Colleges

College_Name: Jodhpur National University - [JNU], Jodhpur
College_Summary: Maharshi Dayanand Saraswati University (MDSU), Ajmer is an affiliated university in Rajasthan. It was established on August 1, 1987, and was accredited as 'B++' by NAAC in 2017. The university boasts a group of magnificent buildings, Hi-Tech Science Laboratories, a state-of-the-art Computer Centre, a prestigious Central Library, an Administrative and Examination Block, and much more. MDS University currently has 435 affiliated colleges located across Ajmer, Bhilwara, Nagaur, and Tonk. Check MDSU Admission 2024.

College_Summary: Mohanlal Sukhadia University (MLSU), formerly known as University of Udaipur is a government university in Udaipur, Rajasthan. Established in 1962, MLSU is recognized by AICTE, PCI, UGC, and BCI and accredited with an ‘A+’ grade by the NAAC. MLSU is also ranked 73rd under the Pharmacy category in NIRF 2023 Rankings. MLSU campus is spread over 607 acres of land and it consists of four constituent colleges and around 190 affiliated colleges from the districts of Chittorgarh, Rajsamand, Sirohi, and Udaipur.

College_Summary: VMOU (previously known as Kota Open University) is a state-level open university located in Kota, Rajasthan. VMOU has 7 regional centers across all the major cities of Rajasthan along with a special centre in New Delhi. VMOU Kota has been recognised by the government of Rajasthan and the UGC. VMOU provides distance education under 22 departments, 7 regional centres, and 5 schools. It offers UG, PG, PhD, Certificate, and Diploma courses in the fields of Arts, Science, Commerce, Management, Computer Science, Education, etc. Some of the popular courses at VMOU are B.Ed, MBA, MCA, BA, MA, and M.Sc.
